rain_sensor.name: Rain Drop Sensor
rain_sensor.tip: Detects rain drops. Has both analog and digital outputs.
rain_sensor.notes: Use the Analog Output (AO) pin for variable rain detection. The Digital Output (DO) is a simple threshold.
warnings: Sensor traces will corrode over time. Power it from a GPIO pin only when reading to extend its life.

lcd_i2c.name: LCD 16x2 (I2C)
lcd_i2c.tip: 16x2 Character LCD with a pre-soldered I2C backpack.
lcd_i2c.notes: The I2C backpack makes wiring much simpler than parallel LCDs. Default address is usually 0x27 or 0x3F.

drv8825_driver.name: DRV8825 Stepper Driver
drv8825_driver.tip: Driver for bipolar stepper motors, an upgrade to the A4988.

dependencies.description: Decoupling capacitor for motor power supply
dependencies.reason: Protects the driver from voltage spikes.

drv8825_driver.notes: Requires 2 GPIO pins (STEP, DIR). Can achieve 1/32 microstepping. Remember to set the current limit before use.
